backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend canister with user profile management, annotation CRUD, PDF storage, and subscription plan handling, all gated by access control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from an old shape to a new shape by adding a nullable `currentPlan` field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the plan tier configuration update (Basic/Premium/Diamond limits, prices, and license counts) to specific frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, hook, page, and style file's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including primary, secondary, accent, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SmartBoard Faculty PDF Portal PWA, referencing the React root div, PWA manifest, and app icons.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for EduBoard defining app name, icons, display mode (standalone landscape), and theme colors for installable app support.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching for navigation and ICP API calls, and cache-first caching for static assets, with old cache cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, admin, faculty portal, teaching view, and developer portal, wrapped in a device registration gate and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasscodeGat: A gate component that wraps admin content behind a username/password login form, persisting authentication state in sessionStorage and supporting a lock event to force logout.
frontend/src/components/AnnotationCanvas: A canvas component that renders and handles interactive drawing annotations (freehand, shapes, text, eraser, images) on top of document pages, exposing a ref for clearing pages.
frontend/src/components/AnnotationToolba: A toolbar component providing controls for selecting annotation tools (draw, highlight, shapes, text, eraser, image), adjusting stroke size and color, navigating pages, and marking content as taught.
frontend/src/components/ChangeAdminCrede: A form component that allows updating admin login credentials (username and password) with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/CreateFacultyMod: A modal dialog for creating a new faculty member by entering their name, with form validation and mutation-based submission.
frontend/src/components/DeviceLimitBlock: A full-screen overlay component displayed when the device limit (10 devices per license) has been reached, informing the user to contact an administrator.
frontend/src/components/DeviceManagement: Displays a card UI for managing registered devices, showing usage progress, a table of device fingerprints, and delete confirmation dialogs with a 10-device limit enforced.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches unhandled errors and renders a full-screen fallback UI with the error message and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/FacultyManagemen: Renders a table of faculty members with per-row inline name editing, active/inactive toggling, and delete confirmation, using React Query mutations for all operations.
frontend/src/components/FacultyPDFList.t: Fetches and displays a list of PDFs assigned to a specific faculty member as clickable cards, navigating to the teach route on click and showing taught/not-taught status.
Renders a centered card with a dropdown to select a faculty member from a list, then calls an onSelect callback with the chosen faculty's id and name.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the app shell with a sticky header (logo, Faculty Portal and Admin nav buttons, lock button on admin routes), a main content slot, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/PDFListTable.tsx: Renders a table displaying uploaded PDFs with their title, assigned faculty names, upload date, and taught/untaught status. Shows an empty state when no PDFs exist.
frontend/src/components/PDFUploadForm.ts: Form component for uploading a PDF with a title and faculty assignment, reading the file as base64 and submitting via the useUploadPDF mutation. Includes validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSect: Displays subscription plan cards (basic, premium, diamond) with billing cycle selection, persists the chosen plan to localStorage, and tracks faculty/PDF usage against plan limits.
frontend/src/context/FacultyContext.tsx: React context that stores and exposes the currently selected faculty member's ID and name, with helpers to set or clear the selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceRegistration: Hook that manages device registration status against the backend actor, immediately granting access since the backend lacks a registerDevice method, with a safety timeout fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to handle login, logout, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data types, plan tier constants, localStorage helpers, and React Query hooks for managing faculty, PDFs, devices, and annotations in the EduBoard frontend.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens plus utility classes for touch targets and annotation canvas.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page protected by a passcode gate, providing UI sections for faculty management, PDF upload/listing, subscription, device management, and admin credential changes.
frontend/src/pages/DeveloperPortal.tsx: Developer-only portal page that displays tabbed views of faculty, PDFs, and device data with stats cards, progress indicators, and refresh controls sourced from React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPortal.tsx: Faculty-facing portal page that shows a faculty selector and, once a faculty member is chosen, lists their assigned PDFs with a sticky header for switching faculty or navigating to the dev portal.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to the Admin Panel and Faculty Portal, plus a notice displaying default admin login credentials.
frontend/src/pages/TeachingView.tsx: Full-screen PDF teaching view page that renders PDFs via PDF.js, supports per-page annotations with drawing tools, and auto-saves annotations to the backend with mark-as-taught functionality.
frontend/src/utils/deviceFingerprint.ts: Generates and caches a stable device fingerprint by combining browser/device characteristics (user agent, screen, canvas hash) with a persisted UUID stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides a React hook for PWA install prompt handling and a utility function to register the service worker for offline/installable app support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom design tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, fonts, shadows, border radii) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the smart board app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata for admin/faculty PDF annotation workflows with device-limited licensing.
